headline: Jim Cramer: Is Medtronic’s (MDT) Deep Discount a Steal?

headline: Medtronic Stock Declines 5.6% in a Month: Time to Buy the Dip?
summary: MDT stock suffers as a result of geopolitical complications and supply issues despite an expanding portfolio and strong strategic executions.
